data.name: 弗洛伊斯(FREUS)
data.detailed_description:
《Freus》 is a platform action game. Help the demon-possessed boy, Freus, to complete his journey of revenge. Use your strengths to your advantage and let Floys dodge through brutal, fast-paced levels, defeat powerful enemies, and make it to the end!

Game Features:


Fast-paced game mechanics:Freus is just an ordinary person who will collapse immediately after being attacked, try not to make mistakes, so that Freus can complete his journey unscathed.

Handcrafted levels:The game contains more than 100 handcrafted levels, each of which is unique and challenging, which will test your skills!

An unusual adventure:Follow in the footsteps of Freus and his friends, go deep into this conspiracy that affects the whole world, and finally decide the direction of the world.

Pure hand-made pixel art:All the art materials in the game are drawn by hand, including interesting pixel-style scenes and frame-by-frame animations.



Come on with Freus! (huh,if you can...)

data.short_description: Freus is a 2D platform adventure game. You will complete your revenge with the abilities given by THE devil in impressive pieces adventures.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

developers: 宇宙超级无敌老铁没毛病制作组
publishers: 宇宙超级无敌老铁没毛病制作组
